title: Stade Père Jégo
text:
The Stade Père Jégo is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Casablanca">Casablanca</a>, Morocco. It is used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and is the <a href="Home%20team">home ground</a> of <a href="Racing%20Casablanca">Racing Casablanca</a>.
The stadium currently holds 10,000 spectators.
